page.title: 02Saturday-parent and child
page.content: 9am Saturday morning my mother woke me and gave me my comic to read. Then I had my{breakfast}of cereal and fruit juice. My father was still in bed after coming home from work at 6am. Afterwards I dressed and watched television until it was time for my music lesson at{Garth.}I went there on the local{bus}paying 10p fare. During my lesson I had theory and played on the piano and organ. My father picked me up and we called at the fish shop to take home portions of fish and chips. After lunch we went by car to {Mumbles}where we walked along the seashore. On the way home we called at {Joe's Ice-cream Parlour.}That evening we changed into our old clothes and watched television. Saturday is an excepton because I can stay up later than usual but when I go to bed I fall fast asleep.
